trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bemidji
There were no other sightings in Bemidji on or around September 15th 2008
Summary: Dull black in color, smaller than commercial airplane, lightning fast
divs: Sighting DetailsIn city limits,next to the lake, driving kids to school. Craft was almost above us. (The clouds were very low, it was misting) My daughter (age 10) said, "look, cool,stealth bomber" Well, thats weird, there would be no stealth bombers in Bemidji MN at 8 am. Like I said, it was low, then as soon as I looked up to see it, it darted up in front of us, moving to the north west into the clouds, fast. No airplane could move that fast, that low. No sound. My daughter drew a picture. It looks just like a boomerang, charcoal black in color. No lights were noticed. It all happened in like 5 seconds. We thought it was neat to see a stealth bomber- but then realized no boomerang shaped stealth bomber would be here. Either way- Either craft, its unexplainable.
